alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 03 at 4:55AM MST until March 03 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST /10 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming and northwestern, south central and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Rosebud Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST /10 AM CST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy spots have developed on roadways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
